GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object with the requested article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of objects with comments for the requested article

comments.body: Esse et expedita harum non. Voluptatibus commodi voluptatem. Minima velit suscipit numquam ea. Id vitae debitis aut incidunt odio quo quam possimus ipsum.
comments.author: cooljmessy

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: allows to post a comment for a determined article_id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: access to edit partially one article determined by its ID

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: allows to delete a comment determined by its id

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
